name: Hockey Stick-Man Ice Skating Rink Pro
name_original: Hockey Stick-Man Ice Skating Rink Pro
description: Un sportsmanship in this stickman hockey game. The hockey players are out to kill you. Use your epic ice skating skills to get you to survive the players onslaught. Fun for all ages, boys and girls. Break free from the typical score of ice hockey puck games and try this one out! If you like other stickman games like stickman skateboarding, stickman football, or any other stickman sports games you will like this one. Stickman fighting games are similar to stickman hockey because your basically fighting in hockey anyway!
